*Mantella frowns* Mantella: Okay..... *Mantella says back to Shredder sadly
and then looks at Magmatron* Mantella: Magmatron, Shredder says that he'll
be gone for a few days..... *Mantella says to Magmatron*
----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, July 06, 2000 12:23 PM
Subject: Neo Beast Wars


> ::Shredder::
>
> Shredder activates his comm-link, replying to Mantella, "I've been hunting
> Maximals-AAHH!!" Shredder goes down to one knee as he turns transparent.
> "Tell    Magmatron    I'll    be    gone    for    a    few    days. See
you
> then," he says with some difficulty, phasing out.
